name: Fragmented Memories (itch)
description:
The game is a short text-based game adventure, to remind everyone how lucky they are to enjoy their health in this challenging times. 

You play as Aria's dad, a girl deceased because of cancer. Your memory is fragmented into pieces and you have to explore the house to find them. Help Aria's dad to navigate through his foggy memory and uncover the last memories with his daughter.
